file_content.text: Trick!
Sleep, sleep, my little one. Sleep like the setting sun. Rest your eyes and rest your cries, and I will see you when you rise.
Trick! Trick... starships gone, mama. All gone.
Hush, love, the starships are fine. Get some sleep.
So, you finally found the White Maw's big secret weapon. Not what you expected?
If he's yours, that's the plug-ugliest Twi'lek I have ever seen.
I hope that's not your kid.
Well, if someone had to find out, I'm glad it was you. You've tracked down our secret weapon.
What secret weapon?
What are you talking about?
I'm guessing he takes after his dad?
[Flirt] You've got a kid?
I let him call me "mama" because it comforts him. I'm the only one who sees him as a child and not a tool.
Is that what a few years on Hoth does to your skin?
What is that?
He's a Kitonak. We call him Trick because that's what he says most often.
This thing has something to do with the White Maw's cloaking device?
Secret weapon?
Meet the White Maw's technological marvel: a poor, brain-damaged child with a connection to the Force. When he's scared, he uses it to hide himself.
It's his own bad luck the effect is powerful enough to extend over an entire fleet.
So, I've been shot by pirates, mauled by wampas, frozen vital body parts, and there is no cloaking device?
This is the cloaker?
What there is, is a living child who suffers every minute he's with the White Maw.
The White Maw aren't big on hospitality.
Poor guy.
They're the ones who bashed in his skull. I nursed him the best I could, but his mind never came back.
Where's a crew like this pick up someone with that kind of talent?
Where'd they find him?
Easy. They killed his parents, bashed his skull open and only later found out he had something they wanted.
He can't use the Force consciously. It only works if he's terrified, so they torture him to keep him in a constant state of fear.
I know you don't owe me anything, but please, I beg you, help me get him out of here.
Please. I've seen how you look at me. I can't tell you how long I've been waiting for a hero.
You want me to help, convince me it's the right thing, not just that you're willing to sell yourself to get it.
You don't have to buy me.
Then look at him! He has the mind of a child. Is there any way it can be wrong to save him from a life of torture?
Leave me here; I can take it. But it's killing Trick.
You deserve better than a life as Shai Tenna's plaything.
[Flirt] I'll take you away.
You'd better be talking about finding her a nice steady job as Senator Dodonna's secretary.
Yes, because a life as your plaything is so much better.
What use can this slave possibly be to you?
Once Shai Tenna's corpse is cold, you could rule the White Maw--be my pirate queen.
[Flirt] Why leave?
Is that better than a real queen? I guess someone forgot to tell me.
Is there, uh, something going on with you two?
He says that to all the girls.
The White Maw should be yours. Let this soft fool croon to her disgusting man-child, while you reap the profits.
Hold me. Make me forget what it feels like when he touches me.
Please. You have a good heart, I see you don't take slaves. Help us escape here.
That boy could change the course of a galactic war... or bring in serious credits.
This is bigger than you.
No! No war! It hurts. Trick!
Don't even joke about that!
The Republic will take you in. The boy, too.
There is a safe haven for you.
You really believe that a Republic general will look past Trick's powers?
You know more about the White Maw than Shai Tenna. Take the reins!
Why leave when you can rule?
Do you really think they would follow me?
Hands off my property, dog!
I will kill her first, and make you watch while she screams for me!
And you wonder why your relationships don't work out?
Your sweet-talk needs work.
Every time she touched you, she was plotting to destroy you!
She was never yours.
When your lover is dead, you will be the one to put the shocks on the boy! I have been too soft on you.
No!
So, you think you are clever to survive the wampas and listen to the fish-dog spill our secrets?
Go tell your master you need a new kennel. I'm taking this one.
Tell Rogun I said "hi."
No one sets himself against Rogun the Butcher and survives.
It doesn't take brains to fight a bully like you.
I don't have to be clever.
I still owe you one.
You're dead. And this time, I'll make sure it sticks.
Sleep, sleep, my darling child. Sleep, though the winds are wild. Rest your eyes and rest your cries, and I will see you when you rise.
Kandhar is dead. Now tell Shai Tenna to get me into the White Maw.
Fantastic. Now we won't be handed off to the Imperials like unwanted puppies.
Sadly, it also means the chance of my "love and lord" getting a blaster bolt between the eyes just dropped to nil.
That's a unique perspective.
Your opinion is noted.
Someone's got to watch the bottom line.
Is that a request?
[Flirt] I can help with that.
Anyone who tried that would need a better reason than me asking.
We'll take him down together. I'll be your visiting hero, and you be my pirate queen.
[Flirt] What better reason?
Don't make me retch.
This simpering bed-toy could never run the White Maw.
It's not like I don't do half of what he takes credit for already. The men are used to listening to me.
The Republic will give you asylum. We can leave this rock together.
[Flirt] Run away with me.
You'll do what?
You really like picking up strays, don't you?
I didn't realize you prefer your women bruised and chained.
What would the Republic want with someone like me?
I've got a job here. I can't let you distract me.
You're right.
That would be new.
I don't understand. Distract you how?
Let me tell you, I've killed better boyfriends.
Is that a request?
That's the best offer I've had in seven years. I wish I could take you up on it.
But if you need something here, I know more about the White Maw than Shai Tenna. I can help you.
If it doesn't get me into the White Maw, I don't need to hear it.
Spare me.
So, why are you really here?
Shai Tenna thinks he's the White Maw's golden boy--like they can't get by without him.
But really, I do everything--pick the hauls, pay the men. All he does is come in shooting.
The Devaronian is dead. His men have fled the planet. This is a good day!
Alilia and I were just talking about you.
Oh, hi.
Ah, was she bragging of my charm?
You'll bring me before the council? Get me into the White Maw?
So our deal stands?
Of course. You held up your end of the bargain.
If he's the best the White Maw has to offer, I'm not impressed.
It was easy.
Ha! Your reputation doesn't lie.
You have proven your worth. You are now my brother in the White Maw.
Of course, I killed both my brothers.
Do what you want with Kandhar. I was just trying to help.
